text.desc: Grant yourself Increased Damage Dealt (S). Fires 4 arrows simultaneously that seek enemies, applying Poison on hit. Arrows prioritize locked-on targets.
Shortens interval.
Increases the number of arrows fired to six.
Extends the duration of the poison and increases the damage dealt by the poison.
Decreases damage dealt by poison, but causes the arrow to explode when it hits. Also inflicts poison on enemies hit by the explosion.
Increases damage dealt when hitting enemies with abnormal conditions.
Extends the duration of the poison and increases the damage dealt by the poison.
Decreases damage dealt by poison, but causes the arrow to explode when it hits. Also inflicts poison on enemies hit by the explosion.

Places an area that heals allies within its range. Dealing damage fills the BC gauge, which increases the healing amount when charged past certain thresholds. BC gauge is reset after firing Cure Arrow.
Increase the amount of BC gauge accumulated when dealing damage.
Increase healing amount.
Increase the amount of BC gauge accumulated when performing Weak Attacks.

When the BC gauge is maxed, expand the heal area and create an overlapping area within it. The inner area provides additional healing and grants Auto Heal. Auto Heal automatically heals players when their HP falls below a certain amount or when its duration expires. The effect expires after healing is granted.

Fire a special arrow that generates a large gravitational field upon impact, pulling in nearby enemies, dealing continuous damage, and applying Increased Damage Taken (S) and Reduced Movement Speed (S) on them.
Fire an arrow into the air, creating an area at the designated location that deals continuous damage.
Can be charged, increasing damage dealt.
Can be charged further, increasing damage dealt.
Reduce charge time.
Reduce area size but increase damage.
Increase duration of the area.
Reduce charge time.
Reduce area size but increase damage.
When activated, the BC gauge fills up faster and the interval between Cure Arrows is shortened.
Effect duration is extended.
Increases the amount of increase.
During activation, the effective range of Cure Arrow is expanded.
When activated, increases movement speed and grants a large amount to the self.
Interval is shortened.
During activation, the effective range of Cure Arrow is expanded.
When activated, increases movement speed and grants a large amount to the self.
Fire an arrow into the air, creating a medium-power healing area at the designated location.
Increase healing amount.
Can be charged, increasing area size and healing amount.
Further increase healing amount.
HP recovery amount decreases, but the interval becomes shorter.
Can be charged further, increasing area size, duration, and healing amount.
Further increase healing amount.
HP recovery amount decreases, but the interval becomes shorter.
Fire a powerful arrow.
Can be charged, increasing damage dealt.
Can be charged further, increasing damage dealt.
Increase charge time but also increase damage.
Reduce charge time.
Increase Weak Attack damage.
Increase charge time but also increase damage.
Reduce charge time.
A four-stage attack that fires arrows. Moving is possible while attacking.
Increase damage of the fourth attack.
Hold the basic attack button while pressing the forward movement key to alter the first stage into an Earth elemental attack.
Enemies hit by the Earth elemental attack are afflicted with Reduced Earth Resistance (S).
Fire an arrow that Sleeps enemies.
Shortens the interval.
Extends the duration of sleep.
Hold down the skill button to charge, and as the charge level increases, it will penetrate enemies.
When an attack hits, it gives a small attack power down.
When an arrow hits an enemy or hits a terrain, it puts them into sleep and puts them into a small reduction in all elemental resistances in the area that is created.
Hold down the skill button to charge, and as the charge level increases, it will penetrate enemies.
When an attack hits, it gives a small attack power down.
Fire an arrow that spreads a portion of the elemental charge accumulated on the hit enemy to nearby enemies.
Increase spread range.
Increase amount of elemental charge spread.
Can be charged, and the spread range expands as the charge level increases.
The interval is extended, but abnormal conditions also spread.
Shortens the interval.
Can be charged, and the spread range expands as the charge level increases.
The interval is extended, but abnormal conditions also spread.
Fire an arrow into the air, creating an area at the designated location that increases the effectiveness of elemental status ailments applied on enemies within it.
Increase area duration.
Can be charged, increasing area size.
Apply Reduced Elemental Resistance (S) on enemies within the area.
Apply Reduced Movement Speed (L) on hit enemies.
Further increase the effectiveness of elemental status ailments.
Apply Reduced Elemental Resistance (S) on enemies within the area.
Apply Reduced Movement Speed (L) on hit enemies.
Fire an arrow that pierces enemies and produces a shockwave around itself.
Increase shockwave size.
Increase arrow damage.
Increased damage dealt by arrows and shock waves
Expands the range of the shockwave and increases the damage dealt.
Expands the range of the arrow and shock wave, increases the damage dealt by the shock wave, and shortens the interval.
Increased damage dealt by arrows and shock waves
Expands the range of the shockwave and increases the damage dealt.
Fire an arrow that creates an area upon impact, granting Increased Damage Dealt (S) to allies and Increased Damage Taken (S) to enemies.
Increase duration of Increased Damage Dealt and Increased Damage Taken.
Increase area duration.
Increase area size.
No longer creates an area but the arrow will pierce targets. Reduce the duration of Increased Damage Dealt but increase its effectiveness.
Increase effectiveness of Increased Damage Dealt and Increased Damage Taken.
Increase area size.
No longer creates an area but the arrow will pierce targets. Reduce the duration of Increased Damage Dealt but increase its effectiveness.
Fire an arrow at the ground, creating an area that removes status ailments and elemental status ailments and resets elemental charge accumulation on yourself and party members.
Shortens interval
Expands area range
Shoots an arrow into the sky and creates an area at the targeted location.
Adds continuous HP recovery and small HP grant to the area effect.
Extends area duration
Shoots an arrow into the sky and creates an area at the targeted location.
Adds continuous HP recovery and small HP grant to the area effect.
Fire an arrow into the air, creating an area at the designated location that deals continuous Earth elemental damage.
Increase area size.
Apply Reduced Movement Speed (M) to enemies within the area.
Increase area duration.
Extends the duration of the movement speed reduction effect and shortens the interval.
Increase Earth elemental charge accumulation.
Increase area duration.
Extends the duration of the movement speed reduction effect and shortens the interval.

Grant yourself a buff that makes your basic attacks fire additional arrows and makes your basic attacks apply Increased Damage Taken (S). Additionally, increase the Weak Attack damage of your basic attack and the additional arrows.
Number of additional arrows increased to 3.
Number of additional arrows increased to 4.
Reduce damage of your basic attacks but Weak Attacks are guaranteed to be critical hits.
Reduce number of additional arrows but increase the duration of Increased Damage Taken.
Increase effectiveness of Increased Damage Taken.
Reduce damage of your basic attacks but Weak Attacks are guaranteed to be critical hits.
Reduce number of additional arrows but increase the duration of Increased Damage Taken.
Dummy
Dummy
Increase the speed at which you rescue downed players.
Increase rescue speed.
Increase rescue speed.
Increase rescue speed.
Slightly increase the recovery amount when you use items, skills, or imagine that recover HP.
Increase recovery amount.
Increase recovery amount.
Increase recovery amount.
Increase Max HP.
Increase Max HP.
Increase Max HP.
Increase Max HP.

Increase Crit Rate.
Increase Crit Rate.
Increase Crit Rate.
Increase Crit Rate.
Reduces the interval when using recovery items
Shortens the interval
Shortens the interval
Reduces interval.
Increase your movement speed while being targeted by an enemy.
Increase movement speed.
Increase movement speed.
Increase movement speed.
Using Cure Arrow provides slight HP recovery for yourself.
Increase recovery amount.
Increase recovery amount.
Increase recovery amount.
Increase damage of Weak Attacks.
Increase damage.
Increase damage.
Increase damage.
Recovery and Buff skills will also fill the BC gauge. Additionally, allies with 20% HP or lower will receive increased healing from Cure Arrow.
Increase HP threshold to 25%.
Cure Arrow can perform critical hits.
Increase HP threshold to 30% and further increase healing amount.
A four-stage attack that utilizes axes. Attack while pressing a sideways movement key to alter the second stage into a spin attack.
Attack while pressing the forward movement key to alter the third stage into a Fire elemental thrust attack.
Attack while pressing the backward movement key to alter the second stage into a kick, granting yourself Increased Damage Dealt (S) on successful hits.
Enemies hit by the Fire elemental attack are afflicted with Reduced Fire Resistance (S).
A multi-stage slashing spin attack. Gain Super Armor during the attack, and a portion of damage dealt is recovered as HP.
Reduce damage taken during the Super Armor.
Adds a finisher attack.
Increase HP drain amount.
Activating the skill while sprinting performs a high-speed dash towards enemies, during which you take reduced damage and have Super Armor.
A powerful combo attack that knocks enemies up and performs multiple spinning hits on the way down.
Perform a powerful sweeping attack.
Increase damage.
Can be charged, increasing damage.
Increase charge time but also increase damage.
Gain Super Armor while charging.
Increase damage when fully charged.
Increase charge time but also increase damage.
Gain Super Armor while charging.
Performs a spinning attack. Hold the skill button to spin up to 2 times, consuming stamina. Successful hits will recover a portion of damage dealt as HP.
Hold the skill button to spin up to 3 times.
Hold the skill button to spin continuously, consuming stamina with each revolution.
Increase HP drain amount.
Increase attack size.
Reduce stamina consumption.
Increase HP drain amount.
Increase attack size.
Halt your movements and perform a two-stage attack. This skill fills the Combo Gauge well.
Becomes a four-stage attack, further increasing Combo Gauge.
Becomes a six-stage attack, further increasing Combo Gauge.
Increase attack size.
Extends the interval, and the damage dealt and combo gauge increase per hit decreases, but there are two hits per stage.
Increase attack speed.
Increase attack size.
Extends the interval, and the damage dealt and combo gauge increase per hit decreases, but there are two hits per stage.
Shout a war cry, granting yourself Super Armor and Reduced Damage Taken (S).
Shortens the interval.
Extends the duration of the effect.
Increases damage reduction effect.
When activated, recovers a certain percentage of own HP and shortens the interval.
Grants immunity to abnormal conditions to the user.
Increases damage reduction effect.
When activated, recovers a certain percentage of own HP and shortens the interval.
Perform a slashing attack by swinging and crossing them. Recover a portion of damage dealt as HP.
Increase HP drain amount.
Increase damage and stagger effect.
Increase stagger effect.
Increase attack size.
Can be charged, increasing damage and HP drain amount.
Increase stagger effect.
Increase attack size.
Launch slashes in front of you. Recover a portion of damage dealt as HP.
Interval reduction
Increases HP absorption.
Shortens the interval more.
HP absorption amount is reduced, but the attack penetrates the enemy and the slash range is expanded.
Extends range.
Shortens the interval more.
HP absorption amount is reduced, but the attack penetrates the enemy and the slash range is expanded.

While active, when your Combo Gauge exceeds a certain amount, using an attack Tactical Skill will consume Combo Gauge to boost the skill's damage. If the Combo Gauge does not exceed the specific amount, the gauge will not be consumed and the Tactical Skill will not have its damage boosted.
Reduce gauge consumption.
Increase the damage boost when Combo Gauge is consumed.
While active, increase Combo Gauge accumulation and reduce Combo Gauge consumption.
After activating Ignition, greatly increase the damage of the next attack Tactical Skill, consuming the entire Combo Gauge. The effect ends after one use.
While active, the Combo Gauge will no longer reset when your HP falls below a certain amount.
While active, increase Combo Gauge accumulation and reduce Combo Gauge consumption.
After activating Ignition, greatly increase the damage of the next attack Tactical Skill, consuming the entire Combo Gauge. The effect ends after one use.
Attack by leaping forward and creating a shockwave upon landing.
Increase attack range.
Increase stagger effect.
Reduce attack range but increase damage.
Increase leap distance.
Gain Super Armor while airborne.
Reduce attack range but increase damage.
Increase leap distance.
While active, a portion of your attacks will recover HP.
Interval shortened
Effect duration extension.

Increases HP absorption amount. While activated, HP will be absorbed by your own attacks (with some exceptions). Reduces interval. Extends effect duration. Recovers a certain percentage of your own HP when activated.
When your HP is at maximum, increase damage dealt to yourself (large)
When activated, a certain percentage of your own HP is recovered.

Increases HP absorption amount. While activated, HP will be absorbed by your own attacks (with some exceptions). Reduces interval. Extends effect duration. Recovers a certain percentage of your own HP when activated.
When your HP is at maximum, increase damage dealt to yourself (large)
Wind up a Fire elemental spinning wheel attack. The wheel remains in place for a short time.
Increase wheel duration.
Can be charged, increasing damage and attack size.
Reduce attack size but increase wheel duration.
Launch the wheel forward, reaching its max size—determined by the charge level—upon impact and remaining in place.
Can be charged further, increasing damage and attack size. Reduce charge time.
Reduce attack size but increase wheel duration.
Launch the wheel forward, reaching its max size—determined by the charge level—upon impact and remaining in place.
Leap forward and slam down in Fire elemental attack. Can be performed a second time. The final attack creates an area that continuously deals Fire elemental damage.
Increase area duration.
Can be performed a third time. Increase the Fire area's size.
Increase area damage.
Reduce area size but increase its rate of dealing damage.
Gain Increased Fire Damage Dealt (S) upon successfully hitting the second hit.
Increase area damage.
Reduce area size but increase its rate of dealing damage.
Halt your movements and perform a two-stage Fire elemental attack. The second stage grants Increased Fire Damage Dealt (S) on successful hits.
Becomes a four-stage attack. The second and fourth stage grant Increased Fire Damage Dealt (S) on successful hits.
Becomes a six-stage attack. The second, fourth, and sixth stage grant Increased Fire Damage Dealt (S) on successful hits.
Increase duration of Increased Fire Damage Dealt.
Reduce duration of Increased Fire Damage Dealt but increase its effectiveness.
Increase Fire elemental charge accumulation and gain Super Armor for the duration of the attack.
Increase duration of Increased Fire Damage Dealt.
Reduce duration of Increased Fire Damage Dealt but increase its effectiveness.

Leap forward with Super Armor to perform a powerful attack that consumes your HP. Can be charged, increasing damage and HP consumption. Can be cancelled while charging with actions such as Dodge. Cancelling the skill will not consume HP. Your HP will not drop below 1 from this skill.
Can be charged further, increasing damage and HP consumption.
Can be charged further, increasing damage and HP consumption.
When charged to level 3 or higher, press the skill button again to attack a second time. The second attack deals increased damage and consumes more HP.
The interval is shortened, and damage dealt increases according to the low HP of the user. As the charge level increases, the flinch effect on hit is strengthened.
Increase maximum distance and velocity.
When charged to level 3 or higher, press the skill button again to attack a second time. The second attack deals increased damage and consumes more HP.
The interval is shortened, and damage dealt increases according to the low HP of the user. As the charge level increases, the flinch effect on hit is strengthened.

Grant HP Drain to yourself and all party members when the party chain reaches a certain amount.

Activating your Ultimate Skill will build Combo and temporarily boost the maximum Combo Gauge value. In this state, the Combo Gauge can be filled by activating Tactical Skills, Ultimate Skills, and performing Perfect Dodges.
Increase maximum gauge.
Increase maximum gauge.
Increase maximum gauge.

A three-stage attack that fires magical bullets. Attacking while pressing a sideways movement key alters the second stage to fire an explosive sphere. Enemies hit by the third stage are afflicted with Reduced Elemental Resistance (S) for all elements.
Attacking while pressing the forward movement key alters the second stage to fire a high damage magic bullet.
Attacking while pressing the backward movement key grants yourself Continuous EP Recovery (S) during the third stage.
Increase size of the explosive sphere and modify its stagger effect.
Launch a Fire elemental magic bullet. Hold to charge, increasing damage and size. Consumes 25 EP. Charging to the max level reduces EP consumption.
Reduce charge time.
Can be charged further, granting yourself Quick Charge.
Reduce EP consumption to 20 EP.
Reduce damage but increase number of hits.
Increase damage of the explosion and effectiveness of Quick Charge.
Reduce EP consumption to 20 EP.
Reduce damage but increase number of hits.
Create an area at the designated location that deals continuous Ice elemental damage, applying Reduced Movement Speed (L) to enemies within the area when it's created.
Increase area size.
Increase area duration.
Increase area size.
Increase area duration.
Increase damage and attack size.
Increase area size.
Increase area duration.
Fire multiple bolts of lightning in a Thunder elemental attack, prioritizing the locked-on target. Consumes 12 EP.
Increase number of lightning bolts to 5.
Increase number of lightning bolts to 7.
Reduce EP consumption to 10 EP.
Increase damage and width of the lightning bolts.
Increase Thunder elemental charge accumulation.
Reduce EP consumption to 10 EP.
Increase damage and width of the lightning bolts.
Recover EP. Hold to continuously recover HP.
Increase EP recovery rate.
Increase EP recovery amount.
Increase EP recovery amount.

Moving is possible while recovering EP. Additionally, accumulate Engram Stacks while in combat, with each stack increasing damage dealt and elemental charge accumulation. Engram Stacks can be filled quickly by Perfect Dodging and using your Ultimate Skill. Taking damage will cause the Engram Stack meter to decrease and accumulation will be temporarily paused.
Perform a chant, summoning a large meteor from the sky in a powerful attack and grant yourself Increased Damage Dealt (S).
Grant yourself Continuous EP Recovery (M).
Shortens interval
Extends duration
Increases recovery speed
Increases maximum EP during effect
During effect time, no stiffness occurs after using T skill
Increases recovery speed
Increases maximum EP during effect
Fire a magic bomb that explodes on impact, dealing Fire elemental damage. Hold to charge, increasing damage. Consumes 30 EP. Charging to the max level reduces EP consumption.
Reduce charge time.
Can be charged further, granting yourself Quick Charge.
Increase explosion size.
Increase stagger effect of the explosion.
Increase damage of the explosion and effectiveness of Quick Charge.
Increase explosion size.
Increase stagger effect of the explosion.
An Ice elemental attack that drops an icicle from the sky at the designated location. Consumes 25 EP.
Increase number of icicles to 2.
Increase number of icicles to 3.
Increase damage.
Increase attack size.
Increase number of icicles to 4.
Increase damage.
Increase attack size.

Create three explosive Thunder elemental spheres in front of yourself that seek enemies and detonate on impact. Deal additional damage to enemies whose elemental status ailment is level 1, level 2, or is elemental bursted. Prioritizes the locked-on target when initially summoned. Consumes 20 EP.
Increase damage.
Increase explosion size.
Increase explosion size.
The spheres no longer move, but they deal increase damage.
Increase explosion damage.
Increase explosion size.
The spheres no longer move, but they deal increase damage.

Summon two crystals that float beside you and fire non-elemental magic bullets when you use attack Tactical Skills, prioritizing locked-on targets. The equipped weapon's element will apply to this skill.

Summon a sphere of lightning above yourself that automatically attacks enemies with Thunder damage. When the sphere hits an enemy, the impact triggers an area attack.

Initiate a constant stream of flames that deal Fire elemental damage, continuously consuming EP. Press the skill button again to end the attack. Moving is possible while attacking, but will increase EP consumption.

Increase damage of the magic bullets. Apply Reduced Elemental Resistance (S) for Earth, Dark, and Light.
Increase stagger effect.
The magic bullets explode on impact.

Summon non-elemental engram from the ground at the designated location, knocking up hit enemies. The equipped weapon's element will apply to this skill, and hit enemies will be afflicted with Reduced Elemental Resistance (S) for the element of the equipped weapon.
Increase attack size.
Increase stagger effect.

Grant yourself Continuous EP Recovery (M) upon successful Perfect Dodges. Has a cooldown between uses.
Activating the effect slightly recovers Stamina.

Increases the amount of stamina recovered when the effect is activated.
A four-stage attack that slashes with the sword. Attack while pressing a sideways movement key to alter the second stage into a spinning slash attack.
Attack while pressing the forward movement key to alter the third stage into a Light elemental thrust attack.
Attack while pressing backward movement key to alter the second stage to strike with your shield, granting yourself Shield Save (S) on successful hits.
Enemies hit by the Light elemental attack are afflicted with Reduced Light Resistance (S).

Prepare your shield to guard against attacks. Successful blocks will consume Shield Gauge. If your Shield Gauge reaches 0, you will be Shield Broken and unable to use shield-based skills. After a successful block, press the basic attack button to perform a Counter Slash.
Increase Shield Gauge recovery speed.
Increase max Shield Gauge.
Increase aggro from enemies hit by Counter Slash.
Activating the skill while sprinting consumes Shield Gauge to initiate Great Guard. Getting hit during Great Guard restores the consumed Shield Gauge and performs a more powerful counter attack.
Place an area centered on yourself that provides Reduced Damage Taken (M) while inside its range.
Increase area duration.
Increase area size.
Additionally grants Increased Elemental Resistance (M).
Additionally grants Increased Damage Dealt (S).
Increase effectiveness of Reduced Damage Taken.
Additionally grants Increased Elemental Resistance (M).
Additionally grants Increased Damage Dealt (S).
Hold the skill button to summon a gigantic shield. While deployed, Shield Gauge is not consumed and movement is disabled. Automatically disappears after some time.
Shorten interval
Extends deployment duration
When the giant shield is deployed, you can separate it by pressing the normal attack button or dash button. While separated, press the skill button to cancel separation.
When guarding with the giant shield, energy accumulates. When deployment ends, a shockwave attack is performed according to the accumulated energy level.
If you successfully guard during deployment, you will be granted a medium damage increase.
When the giant shield is deployed, you can separate it by pressing the normal attack button or dash button. While separated, press the skill button to cancel separation.
When guarding with the giant shield, energy accumulates. When deployment ends, a shockwave attack is performed according to the accumulated energy level.

Initiates a running charge attack that can be stopped by pressing the skill button again. Consumes Stamina while charging. A finishing attack can be performed by pressing the skill button again. While charging, your shield will guard against attacks, consuming Shield Gauge.
Reduce stamina consumption while running.
Increase movement speed while running.
Increase damage of the finishing attack after running a certain distance.
Shield Gauge will not be consumed when blocking attacks.
Improve maneuverability while running and increase attack range of the running attack and finishing attack.
Increase damage of the finishing attack after running a certain distance.
Shield Gauge will not be consumed when blocking attacks.

Recover a large amount of HP and gain various effects. If you are shield broken, your Shield Gauge is fully restored. The Ult Gauge will be filled by successful attacks and blocks. Activating the skill with a full Ult Gauge will consume the gauge and grant your allies various buffs. Level 1: Reduced Damage Taken (M) and HP Regeneration (S). Level 2: Increased Damage Dealt (S). Level 3: Status Ailment Immunity.
Slam your sword into the ground, pulling in nearby enemies and Provoking them. Greatly increases your aggro.
Shortens the interval.
Expands the range of the attack.
When the attack hits, you become even more likely to be targeted.
When an attack hits, it reduces attack power slightly.
Increases the target.
When the attack hits, you become even more likely to be targeted.
When an attack hits, it reduces attack power slightly.

After activating Taunt, your next attack will Provoke hit enemies, grant yourself maximum aggro from hit enemies, and further increase your aggro. Taunt's effect will end after the next attack hits or when its duration is exceeded.
Interval shortening
Prolonged duration of taunt effect
When activated, grants super armor to the user.
When the effect ends, the shield gauge is restored. When the shield breaks, the guard break time is reduced.
Extends the duration of the taunt effect, shortens the interval
When activated, grants super armor to the user.
When the effect ends, the shield gauge is restored. When the shield breaks, the guard break time is reduced.
Raise your shield and perform a dash attack. Enemies that are hit will be Stunned. While dashing, your shield will guard against attacks, consuming Shield Gauge.

Reduce Shield Gauge consumption.

While Fortress is active, Counter Slash will perform a second slash.

Raise your shield and perform a dash attack. Hits create small Light elemental explosions. While dashing, your shield will guard against attacks, consuming Shield Gauge.
Increase dash distance.

Enemies hit by the explosions are pulled inwards.

A multi-stage attack that launches your hammer's ball. The last stage pulls in hit enemies. Consumes 1 Cartridge. Hold to reload. Reload with 0 Cartridges remaining to Quick Reload, granting 2 bonus Cartridges.

Activate the skill while inputting the dash button to perform a rush attack. Rush attacks cannot be used consecutively. Also, if you press and hold while inputting a backward movement, you can perform a charge shot. If you fire a charge shot at charge level 1, it consumes 2 cartridges, and the final stage of the round shot becomes an area attack that attracts multiple enemies. If you fire it at charge level 2, it will be a powerful attack that consumes all cartridges. If 3 or more cartridges are consumed but not exceeding 5, the interval for tactical skills is shortened. If 6 or more cartridges are consumed, the user is granted a small damage increase and cartridge consumption is reduced for a certain period of time.

A four-stage spear attack. Hold the basic attack button to charge an attack that applies a Burst Mark. Activate a Burst Mark to make the attack deal more damage against the enemy. The fourth stage extends the duration of debuffs. Attack while pressing a sideways movement key to alter the second stage into a sweeping attack.
Attack while pressing the forward movement key to perform an attack that applies a Void Mark. Activate a Void Mark to apply Reduced Damage Dealt (M) on the enemy.

Attack while pressing the backward movement key to alter the second stage into an attack that applies an Entanglement Mark. Activate an Entanglement Mark to apply Reduced Movement Speed (L) on the enemy. Activating a Burst Mark, Void Mark, and Entanglement Mark simultaneously will trigger the additional attack Final Bloom.
The attacks that apply Void Marks and Entanglement Marks become Thunder elemental attacks.

When an engraving is consumed, grants the "HP absorption effect when attacking" to the user. The duration of the effect is extended according to the number of engravings consumed. After the effect is granted once, it can be granted again after an interval.

A four-stage attack utilizing a guitar consisting of three melee attacks and a final ranged attack. The melee attacks produce area attacks from your amp, and the ranged attack produces an area attack if it hits your amp. Attack while pressing a sideways movement key to alter the second stage into an area attack centered on yourself and your amp. Hold the basic attack button to perform an area attack centered on yourself and your amp, and if your Heat Gauge is full, activate High Spirit. During High Spirit, increase the size and damage of four-stage combo's area attacks, and increase the size and stagger effect of the sideways input variant.

Attack while pressing the forward movement key to perform a ranged Light elemental attack that becomes an area attack if it hits your amp. During High Spirit, greatly increase the elemental charge accumulation of this attack.

Attack while pressing the backward movement key to perform a ranged attack that becomes an area attack if it hits your amp, granting yourself a buff that fills your Heat Gauge over time. During High Spirit, this buff changes into a buff that reduces Stamina consumption while dodging.
Enemies hit by the Light elemental attack are afflicted with Reduced Light Resistance (S).
Place an amp that duplicates your attacks and buffs into area attacks and area buffs. Hold the button to place at a designated location.
Increase maximum amp placement distance.
Increase amp duration.

Use Tactical Skills to build Count. At 3 Count, place a buff area centered on yourself and your amp. The buff depends on the type of the Tactical Skill or basic attack variant used to reach the third Count. Buff Tactical Skill/Forward Basic Attack: Reduced Damage Taken (M). Debuff Tactical Skill/Sideways Basic Attack: Increased Damage Dealt (S). Recovery Tactical Skill/Backward Basic Attack: Increased Recovery (M).

Perform a magnificent piece, synchronously creating an area centered on yourself and your amp that deals damage to enemies and provides healing for allies. Additionally, the area grants Increased Damage Dealt (M) and Reduced Damage Taken (S) in that order.
